email.subject: One new trail camera image
email.body:
Camera has recorded new images during the lat 24 hours.

You can see them at: {{- url}}

app.delete_image_password_request: Enter password to delete the image.
app.title: Trail camera images
app.info: Click thumbnails to see a detailed photo. New images from the camera appear on this page automatically.
app.icons_copyright: Icons made by {{freepik_link}} from {{flaticon_link}} are licensed by {{license_link}}
